name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Traveler's Cosmetic Bundle
description: The contents of this bundle are cosmetic only and applicable to all weapons, tents, and ground blinds in the game. They can be previewed in-game for free before purchasing.
Sin descripción

name: Untamed
description: Untamed is a planned multiplayer creature survival game that takes place in a post apocalyptic world full of overgrown ruins.

name: Warmage
description: Your city is under attack Warmage ! In this grid-based turn-based roguelite, defend the many different districts of your city against waves of enemies with the help of one of your students, and in between, buy and upgrade spells to prepare for the worst.

name: Unveiling
description: Experience the UFO abduction in first person and take a trip to meet thy keeper. Explore layers of reality and learn what is concealed behind the modern Unidentified Anomalous Phenomenon (UAP) in this esthetic and eerie interactive experience.

name: Sweet Time
description: "Sweet Time" is a restaurant simulation management game, players need to play the role of a debt-ridden protagonist to run a restaurant and pay off debts, in a year's time, you can expand the restaurant, renovate the layout and recruit employees, a variety of side plots and endings, you start.

name: Doomsday Overture
description: A role-playing game with multiple endings. Throughout the ten years of life from childhood to adolescence, the protagonist will experience encounters, sacrifices, choices and separation. Also: This game does not support English, please understand.

name: Where is Drake?
description: Find a hidden pirate in a massive crowd of people, and be prepared to be spooked!

name: Witchy Woes
description: When a power hungry, egotistical young witch disobeys her school’s headmasters, she is cast out and exiled. Play as Devious Donna as she wreaks havoc on those who have wronged her. Harness the dark arts and exact your revenge on the masters of magic.

name: Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty - Upheaval in Jingxiang
description: The third DLC, "Upheaval in Jingxiang," depicts Liu Bei's forces as they fight back against the threat of Elixir that has gripped Jing Province since the death of Yu Ji.

name: Workshop Simulator VR
description: Become the atelier artisan you've always wanted to be. Take on restoration contracts, scale up your toolkit, and expand your workshop in the calming, immersive experience of Workshop Simulator VR.

name: Valuable Cargo
description: Valuable Cargo is a 3D forklift simulator. Your task - to transport goods across different levels and deliver them to the required places. The game features different locations, each location will require attention and skills from you, as various obstacles await you on the way to delivering goods.

name: Tower of the Abyss
description: Explore a fantasy 2.5D roguelike game with a unique lineup of heroes and an ancient World Tree at the village's center. Discover diverse items and skills to craft your own strategies as you journey towards the depths of the abyss. Challenge the end of the abyss in this captivating fantasy world.

name: Train Sim World 4: Cargo Line Vol. 1 - Petroleum
description: Discover different freight services with Skyhook Games' Cargo Line for Train Sim World 4. In Volume 1, keep the UK running with modern, VTG-branded TEA tankers, driving heavy fuel-laden services - a flammable challenge awaits.

name: Trash in the Flower Garden
description: A rumor spread through the school that Ina likes girls. She denied it with a bold face when her teacher asked, but inside she was worried. Who could have exposed her secret?

name: Trail of the Wretched
description: Nobody said being a photographer was easy.

name: Trickster Chaos
description: Hack, Slash and backflip your way to victory in a challenging and humorous boss rush game.

name: TVS Sample Box
description: Experimental Trash Vomit Studios Prequels, Prototypes & Mini-games collection.

name: Twizzle Puzzle: Animals
description: Twizzle Puzzle: Animals - is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime.

name: The Ogi: Cycles
description: The Ogi: Cycles is a cozy adventure set in the world of Mullar! Find out about curious places, the terrible storms, meet new friends and experience the unique areas by drawing your way through an emotional story!

name: Spark of Survival
description: Defend your kingdom by fighting back against an approaching robot invasion. Place, upgrade, and relocate elementally-charged towers strategically to destroy incoming robots. Watch as elements collide and combine to create explosive reactions!

name: Streetdog BMX
description:
Get ready for massive tricks, high scores, and gnarly slams in Streetdog BMX. Carve your way through six huge maps featuring hidden spots, handcrafted challenges, and flowing lines!

Customize your bike and rider before hitting the streets to explore six maps packed with wallrides, gaps, bowls, ramps and rails. Uncover new spots, complete handcrafted challenges, and link up your combos!

name: TableTop Soccer: Redux
description: TTS is back with another fresh take on strategic and tactical games - skill based goal keepers, physics based kicking, 10 player teams, full steam multiplayer, new graphics, offline play and lots more

name: Take Bomb: The Suit Take Off
description: This is an action game in which the player cannot jump by himself, but jumps with the blast of a bomb. You can dash with the blast on your back, and even attack with bombs, allowing you to enjoy bombs to the fullest.

name: Temporarily
description: Temporality is a first-person game where the player takes on the role of Jack who wakes up in a room without knowing how the protagonist got here and must travel through the past. of him and his wife to find the truth.

name: The Balls
description: Fresh Online PvP Battle Royale FPS. Players (balls) are not bound by gravity, centrifugal force, direction, or predetermined paths. They can instantly reach any location they desire, making the Battle Royale more dynamic than ever before. Utterly addictive!

name: The Da Vinci Cryptex 3
description: Take the challenge again and crack 50 new amazing riddles in the third chapter of The Da Vinci Cryptex! series!

name: Royal Romances: The Cursed Hearts DLC
description: Unravel the enigmatic tale, confront the shadows of the past, and steer your destiny towards a love that transcends the ordinary!

name: Rookie Guard and the Queen
description: A young soldier, Royd, just passed the exam to become a guard in the palace! While doing a routine night patrol during his probation period, he discovered the dark secret of the queen and his life was never the same...

name: Rogue Fable IV
description: Rogue Fable IV is a traditional rogue-like game which combines the depth, complexity, and challenge of the genre classics with a shorter, more tightly focused game length.

name: Realms of Madness
description: Command legions of soldiers, unleash mythical creatures, and dominate the seas in this highly tactical real-time strategy game. Develop your fantasy fortress and strengthen its economy before leading the siege. Your battles shall stretch from the depths of the seas to dragon-filled skies.

name: Paprika Trainer
description:
You play as a inmate being kept in the WOOHP asylum for the criminally insane. When suddenly the power goes out, all the villains escape and turn Beverly Hills into a warzone. It's up to you and the three spies to go undercover and take back the city!

In this game you go on missions, capture gang leaders and keep your spies safe by preforming more and more slutty actions. While playing you will encounter an engrossing, comedic story, a fully implemented mission mini-game, lots of supporting characters and of course many many lewd scenes. Most of which are fully animated and voice acted!

name: Hiraeth
description: HIRAETH is a sci-fi, first-person survival game set on a desolate, alien planet. Adapt to various threats while discovering the secrets of the abandoned, dystopian colony. You can choose between two distinct game modes that share common gameplay mechanics - sandbox and story.

name: My Cute Fuhrer
description: A small satiric anti-war game with a cute Fuhrer as a lead character. Will you be able to melt her heart?

name: Hentai Bad Girls
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. All characters appearing in this game are over 18 years of age. Enjoy ;-)

name: Elithian Races Mod
description: Elithian Races Mod is a substantial expansion designed for Starbound, introducing four fresh playable races alongside an extensive array of hundreds of new items, objects, weaponry, armor components, and numerous other enhancements. Two additional outposts have been incorporated, brimming with fresh quests and various merchants for players to engage with.

name: Phantom Dust
description: Phantom Dust was a planned reboot/remake game to the Original Phantom Dust (2004) developed by Darkside Game. It was officially cancelled on 2015.

name: Meadgard
description: Run your own viking pub in a chaotic co-op management adventure! Grab your friends, axes and tankards, and work together to both serve and fight your hot-headed customers. It’s time to show the world what viking hospitality looks like!

name: Hungry Hearts Diner: Memories
description: The 4th game in the Hungry Hearts Diner series and a prequel that takes place early in the Diner's history. Granny is joined by her husband Gramps to serve food to their neighbourhood in their diner and via the deliveries mechanic, with new patrons and a few familiar cameos.

name: Smoking Kills
description: Follow an un-named gun-for-hire contracted to target smokers and smoking campaigns in this parody of assassin games.

name: Closing at 2
description: In Closing at 2, you play as a bartender at the Lakeside Inn. You get to converse with the customers and make them some delicious drinks. However, as the night goes on, the customers and their orders become a bit... odd. And you better not mess up their order! Do you have the bartending skills to make it 'til 2 am?

name: Stargate SG-1: Entropy Syndrome
description:
A mobile game developed by G5 Entertainment and published by SkyZone Entertainment.

This follow-up to 2004’s Stargate SG-1 mobile game is an isometric adventure game, with seven missions ranging from action to puzzle solving. Following the plot of the popular TV series ‘Stargate SG-1’, Colonel O’Neill and Teal’c are back in action, as they embark on top-secret missions in a military base, a space ship, and the solid ground of Earth.

name: Stargate SG-1
description:
A side-scrolling mobile game based on the TV series Stargate SG-1, featuring four story-based missions: "Derelict", "Malfunction", "Paradise Lost", and "Aten's Curse".

Based on the hit TV series, this game presents various challenges across four thrilling missions. As Colonel Jack O'Neill, you're the leader of the Stargate SG-1 team. From the surprise appearance of a Goa'uld mothership to the mysterious discovery of an ancient tomb, you and your team face snake-headed soldiers and other perils of the universe.

name: Bombcapsule
description: Run and Dodge, and Destroy the waves of Bombs. Brand New Arena Shooter!

name: Erannorth Renaissance
description: Erannorth Renaissance is a text-driven narrative RPG featuring turn-based tactical battles, where destiny is shaped by the echoes of your past. Carve your path through an enchanting Renaissance-fantasy world, where every decision molds your character and weaves your unique tale.

name: Grave Gunner
description: A fast-paced gothic arena FPS. Survive as a gunslinger against waves of undead monsters, utilising smooth and expressive movement, sliding, rocket jumping and formidable duel handguns. Easy to pickup, yet only a master gunslinger shall defeat all waves then claim the final reward!

name: Evolution: From the Little Light
description: A small creature is born in the depths of the ocean, beginning its journey for survival in a ruthless world. Embark on a 2D adventure full of exploration and puzzles, making crucial decisions, facing dangers and discovering the hidden secrets of evolution.

name: Ememe
description: Ememe Town, a place where AI NPCs live freely. Chatting, laughing, falling in love... Now, let's simulate the life of your favorite character with generative AI!

name: Broke Signal Badlands: A World of Desert Adventure
description: A simple choose-your-adventure RPG, set in the desert. You're a line man that's stolen the company truck, in search of enlightenment. Roll your dice, and get into trouble.

name: Date With the Night
description: Ben O'Hara and his new assistant Yuhiko Kosuke have a Date With the Night in this Noir Survival Horror. Choose your character to investigate a new thrilling case in the sequel to the critically acclaimed cult hit Ghost at Dawn. Navigate your way through unspeakable horrors in an abandoned apartment building while piecing together clues to solve how so many people suddenly went missing.

name: Oblin Party
description: A wacky physics-based, couch/online party brawler where the hands do the talking. Utilize your elastic arms to wield powerful items, or swing, slingshot, grab, and punch to catapult your opponents off the map. Perfect for quick, hilarious multiplayer sessions with friends!

name: Slime Brawly Brawl
description: An early prototype, Slime Brawly Brawl exists to scratch an itch. An itch for a simple, fast paced platformer melee game like 90s kids might have played and loved growing up.

name: Arena: Gameboy Edition
description: Step into the pixelated realm of nostalgia with the AR3NA: Gameboy Classic Edition DLC! This remastered version takes you back to the roots of the original AR3NA, featuring 100 challenging levels that will test your precision and gaming prowess.

name: Contraption Maker: Incredible Puzzles Pack
description: Over 160 new puzzles in the spirit of the original puzzles from The Incredible Machine.

name: Augury Point
description: Murder Mystery meets Dating Sim in a small southwestern town beset by cults & conspiracies. Can you prevent your coffee shop from closing, solve your uncle’s murder and maybe even find love?

name: Medieval Life
description: 'Medieval Life,' an immersive open-world RPG. Experience the Middle Ages like never before with realistic game mechanics, dynamic character development, and a narrative shaped by your choices. Explore, strategize, and forge your legacy in a historically rich, living medieval world.

name: Pyramid Schemes and Cults
description: Did you ever want to start your own company and convert it into a cult? Try it now in Pyramid Schemes and Cults a 2D, 8-bit clicker. How big will your company become?

name: Decayed
description:
DECAYED is an open-world post apocalyptic singleplayer survival game.

Choose your own battles. Come out weapons blazing, using your tactical skills and whits to make your way through the undead, or hunker down and protect an area, standing your ground.

Explore the world with absolute freedom. Stay in the city and loot buildings, homes, or bases for powerful items, or stay secluded in a forest, with the decreased abundance of threats. There are zero restrictions by missions or NPC's. You are your own commander now.

name: Galvanized
description: A fast paced, movement focused FPS in a foreboding, post-apocalyptic setting.

name: Frisia
description: In Frisia you start on an uninhabited Northsea island and are tasked with building a picturesque and cozy village in harmony with the sea.

name: Adventuro
description: Dive into Adventuro, where nostalgic 3D gaming meets a modern twist! Explore vibrant worlds with early-2000s inspired graphics and gameplay in this family-friendly, immersive adventure.

name: Scream or Die: Virtual Circus
description: Horror game. The player needs to get out of the maze with animatronics.

name: Infected Bunker
description: Infected Bunker is a 2D platformer. You have to go through one level after another, destroying enemies in locations. In a dark and gloomy environment, you have to use your ax in battles against creepy zombies and aggressive bugs to survive and get free from this mysterious place.

name: CandyVenture: Rebaked
description: Berry and his friends count on you! Evil monsters invaded the candy world and stole all the candies. But you and our heroes are here to save their candy world! Use their powers to destroy the monsters in this cozy 2D adventure game!

name: Mana
description: Immerse yourself in the dynamic world of MANA, where strategic brilliance combines with explosive visuals! Engage in intense multiplayer battles, using angles to unleash a dazzling array of shapes and colors. MANA reinvents strategic warfare with a visually stunning and uniquely dynamic twist.

name: Jump Out
description: Jump Out is a platformer game that challenges you to master the ability to jump. Inspired by other games that test your climbing skills, this game will push you to the limit as you strive to reach the top.

name: Pathfinder: Abomination Vaults
description: Pathfinder: Abomination Vaults is the first-ever co-op Hack and Slash ARPG based on the Adventure Path, in which players lead iconic Pathfinder heroes into the depths of Gauntlight Keep and battle deadly abominations to reach the evil sorceress Belcorra Haruvex and end her vile schemes.

name: Christmas Puzzle 5
description: Complete matching puzzle levels and create a gingerbread Hansel and Gretel decoration. Tackle a series of quests from cleaning cookie crumbs to creating a gingerbread house, a castle and a chocolate factory. Get ready for a heartwarming conclusion as the characters find their way home.

name: 3D Puzzle: Post-Apocalyptic 3
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

name: 3D Puzzle: Breaking Bed
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

name: DNA: Episode 1
description: DNA is an episodic retro, story-driven 2D side scrolling beat em' up that welcomes the world into the DNA universe in a highly interactive anime where the player completes side scrolling segments while progressing through engaging animations depicting the fascinating origins story of DNA.

name: Fighting
description: A battle role-playing game The main task is for players to control the protagonist in battles, defeat enemies one by one, gain experience points and coins to upgrade. Further acquire stronger weapons and skills.

name: Boo's There?
description: Boo’s There is a single-player time management game where players must question trick or treaters at your doorstep on Halloween night. Visitors vary from monsters to regular trick-or-treaters, so watch and question visitors for any clues as you do your best to protect your town from peril!

name: Eternal Gem
description: This is a puzzle and leisure mini game suitable for players of all stages, with a cartoon style of version Q that people cannot put down.

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: It's a Night Magic Dancing Night, Merry Night All in Pack
description: This DLC includes the following content: 【Costume】 Kitty Santa Set Graceful Santa Set 【Hair parts】 Mini French Braid Hair Set Refined Hair Set (Refined Ribbon included) 【Dance】 Night Magic Fire CUSTOM ORDER MAID Premium medley

name: Love You till the End
description: Stealth-based game that challenges to navigate the delicate balance between love and fear. Step into the shoes of a misunderstood monster who has fallen in love with human girl.

name: Tharaba
description: Dive into the exhilarating world of Tharaba, Time Each Hit Perfectly and compete for the highest score.

name: Psychic Storm
description: Humanity's last hopes ride on the Stormbringer super weapons as they journey throughout the Milky Way. Can they succeed?!

name: Granada
description: The legend of Granada. Only those who've seen it know the truth.

name: Gaiares
description: Mother Earth faces unprecedented environmental destruction at the hands of human activity. Can Earth be saved?!

name: Avenger
description: Retake the ultimate weapon - Volos - from the Alliance!

name: Red Nose Guy Suika
description: Red Nose Guy Suika is the latest addition to the Suika series. In this casual game, strategically merge balls to achieve the highest score. Challenge friends on the Steam leaderboard and immerse yourself in an entertaining gaming experience that combines fun and strategy!

name: Henry's Escape: Prison
description: “Henry’s Escape" is an immersive adventure game where you need to use your puzzle-solving skills to help Henry, who is wrongfully accused of murdering his wife, Elena, to escape from prison and uncover the true killer. The game’s realistic graphics and puzzles make for an entertaining experience.

name: Chou Sentou-chuu: Battle for Money
description: Sin descripción

name: Brothel Secrets
description: Brothel Secrets is a mesmerizing visual novel for adults that describes the world of brothel work. The protagonist is an unemployed homeless man and a crook who comes to the brothel "Juicy Boobs" in search of freebies

name: Ice Breaker
description: Ice Breaker is a physics-puzzle game released January 4, 2009, and is the first installment of the Ice Breaker series. The player must use the mouse to cut ice and objects to get the vikings to their longboat. This game, along with twelve other games, was made a distributable game on August 25th, 2011, and was one of the first distributable games.

name: Pirate Jam: Space DLC
description: Embark on a cosmic puzzle adventure in Pirate Jam's Space DLC! Navigate treacherous black holes and dodge interstellar threats in 10 challenging new levels. Experience advanced space strategy and outwit the universe in this unique, celestial journey.

name: Castle Corp
description: Castle Corp, full name Castle Corp - Castleware for All Occasions, is a strategy game released on June 25, 2009[1], three days after the release of Double Edged. The player's goal is to save the Castle Corp company, a group made up of knights that sell medieval-related weapons, from a rival company.

name: Skywire 2
description:
Skywire 2 is the sequel to the game Skywire, and was released on June 2nd, 2008. It is the second game in the Skywire series. Like the original Skywire, the player controls a cable car and tries to safely carry three passengers to the station, avoiding robotic animals such as ostriches, parrots, rhinos, and camels.
This game was made a distributable game on July 18th, 2012. An HTML5 port of the game was released on Poki during the time period of June 10th - August 13th, 2021[1], with a Nitrome website release following later.

name: Capsule Cat's Big Space Adventure
description: Grab a friend and blast your way through Capsule Cat's Big Space Adventure! Assemble the perfect robot. Slay strange aliens. Narrowly weave through barrages of bullets, lasers and ...tentacles? Test your teamwork with this heart-pumping teeth-clenching action-packed odyssey!

name: Hazard Protocol
description: Team up in this procedurally generated world, solving dynamic puzzles, and engaging in intense top-down action. Choose your controls, face the unknown, and master the Hazard Protocol with your elite squad!

name: A Spider to A Fly
description: 90's Horror inspired Point & Click — a Dark and Emotional journey of a man looking for his missing son while facing his hidden demons. Enjoy an Atmospheric & stylized world, haunting and memorable audio, and piece together a story that will stay with you long after it ends.

name: Epic Eon
description: Epic Eon is a single-player RTS game set in a unique fantasy world distinct from other RTS games. It doesn't include workers, buildings, or resource gathering. Instead, monarchs lead factions, create units, capture resources, and engage in combat to conquer rival monarchs.

name: Spectacle
description: Change your surroundings in the blink of an eye. Wield powerful glasses that enable you to see and interact with the world in new ways. Spectacle is a surreal first-person puzzle game about observation, spatial reasoning, and lizards.

name: Brownie's Haunted Christmas
description: A cozy Christmas cooking horror experience! Join Brownie in mixing, baking cookies, and decorating as you help him prepare his new home for the holidays. Overcome the mischievous ghost, earn coins, and transform his house into the ultimate cozy Christmas haven. Are you up for the challenge?

name: Highschool53
description: "Highschool53" is an adventure game that takes you on an exciting journey with Ahmed, who explores an abandoned school in Saudi Arabia. Ahmed faces complex mysteries and dangerous dangers, all to uncover the school's secrets. Will he succeed in staying and solving the mystery?

name: Super Spelling Ducks
description: Push blocks, build words. There’s just one snag: you’re a duck! Play with your friends co-operatively to make words together in the main puzzle campaign, and then challenge them to make better words in multiple party games! Quack, waddle, and unleash the chaos of ducks!

name: Sex Simulator: Bar Staff
description: A sex simulation game with visual novel elements where you play the role of a guy who wants to hire the hottest women for his new bar.

name: Aviators VR
description: A short, educational adventure game about Polish air personnel during World War II. A 3D FPP (First Person Perspective) game with elements of shooting, exploration, and logical puzzles.

name: Charrua Soccer: Mirror Edition
description: With lots of action and adrenaline, Charrua Soccer is an arcade game that brings you only the most fun part of soccer! And now in this "Mirror Online" edition, we invite everyone to play online in a different and very original way!

name: Hodge Dodge
description: Crank this, dodge that. Only on Playdate

name: End Of Life
description: End of Life is a third-person shooter that takes place in a city that is fragmented and in constant motion. These fragments that make up the city rotate as if it were a Rubik's Cube, creating different gravitational directions that allow the player to traverse the city.

name: Master of Magic: Scourge of the Seas
description: Master of Magic: Scourge of the Sea is an enchanting voyage into a realm where the sea wields its sorcerous

name: Reign Down
description: A physics based, point-and-click tower defense game where you equip castles with traps to defend your king. Be creative and embrace the chaos that ensues!

name: Event Race
description: Event Race is the ultimate local multiplayer racing game, accommodating up to 30 players. Use your smartphone as an additional controller, gather friends and family, and immerse yourself in a fun, chaotic, and unforgettable racing competition.

name: Consult Me Before Opening A Snack Shop
description: What, you want to open a snack shop? Better call me!

name: Final Paradox
description: Final Paradox is a minecraft CTM map where you will find an immersive story and a deep lore, with interesting characters and memorable antagonists, from the imposing conqueror to your faithful companion Koros. This map contains amazing scenery, challenging enemies, and unique mechanics. It has more than 40 hours of gameplay that you can enjoy alone or with friends.

name: Starminer
description:
Design and build an interstellar mining fleet to strip space of its invaluable minerals, and sell them for a tidy profit. But beware. Your greed will attract the alien. Use warships and defense platforms to protect your fleet at all costs - in real space, in real time.

Starminer is a space industry and logistics simulation that strives to be at the forefront of space strategy gaming, blending cutting-edge rendering technologies with deep tactical and creative gameplay. It's set against backdrops of fully-realized 3D environments, where the beauty of space becomes an integral part of player immersion, setting Starminer apart as a visually stunning and technologically advanced space base-building game. Starminer is built with realism and immersion as core design pillars through the incorporation of Newtonian physics for propulsion and movement. This not only adds a layer of authenticity and complexity to the gameplay but also introduces a rewarding learning curve for players seeking a genuinely advanced spacefaring experience.

In Starminer, the universe is more than just a pretty backdrop for exploration and conquest—it's a playground for players to explore their creativity and long-term ambitions for their fleets. Central to the game's creative ethos is the ability to design a variety of space stations that bring them toward their goals; whether it's to mine resources, be a defensive power, colonization, energy production, or something else entirely. The dynamic and customizable nature of these different types of stations means that the player doesn’t only decide what their cosmic empire will be; it will become a unique reflection of their strategic prowess and imaginative flair.

name: XRick
description: An unofficial port of Rick Dangerous for PC.

name: Craft
description: A Minecraft clone which is available as a standalone core on Libretro platforms.

name: Gong
description: A pong clone available on Libretro platforms.

name: Run Show Quest
description: Simple, casual game where you run as a teenager, dodging obstacles for points. Cartoon graphics, easy for all ages.

name: Arcade Archives: Aero Fighters
description: The sonic guys are here, risking their lives on eight missions!

name: Black Prophecy
description: Among all game types, audio games are also a category that can bring joy to players, as players can enjoy the joy brought by music.

name: DarkAndLight
description: Use clues to power up generators, find weapons to kill zombies, and utilize items to escape the bunker maze!

name: Who am I: Remedy
description: Horror-detective game created on Unreal Engine 5. Solve puzzles, read notes, enjoy original soundtrack, don't forget to pick up the phone and finally, answer the question "Who am I?".

name: Welcome to the Karoshi Club
description: If you're nervous about job searching and interviews, face your fears head-on in "Welcome to the Karoshi Club" a Japanese horror business punk visual novel.

name: VelocityLoop, Zero to Lightspeed
description: Sci-fi outer space 3D racing game. Primarily uses keyboard for menus and game controller for game play.

name: Vaporware Odyssey
description: Vaporware Odyssey is a synthwave/vaporwave inspired action roguelike. You are stuck in grid space. You strive to escape to a realm of better vibes. Battle hoards of enemies, collect items and upgrades, and search for an escape from this digital dystopia.

name: Squirrel Jump: Forest Pathway
description: "Squirrel Jump - Forest Pathway" takes you on a charming adventure through 30 levels of vibrant forest puzzles. Leap through platforms, skillfully timing your jumps to reach the cozy Squirrel House. Immerse yourself in this engaging game, guiding the squirrel to its treetop haven!

name: Spirita Battler
description: A casual fun multiplayer creature battler. Build your own teams by choosing unique creatures, their skills and special abilities! Develop strategies to better deal against though opponents and climb the ladder to the top!

name: Sonar Shock
description: Submarine’s haunted! Hunt and be hunted in this horror dungeon crawler inspired by the decay of the Soviet Union (and immersive RPGs from the 90s).

name: Skirmish Squad
description: Choose your characters and establish your strategy! Strengthen your party with endless upgrades as you ascend the tower.

name: Skullgirls: Marie
description: She lived long enough to become a villain, but died to become a hero: at long last MARIE joins the Skullgirls cast! This DLC includes Marie, her new stage, 29 palettes, character tutorials/trials, and full Story Mode.

name: Shades of Rayna: Lasher Class
description: Lasher class for Shades Of Rayna

name: Sea under the sea under the sea
description: The year is 2082. Most of the planet is covered with water, and the composition of marine fauna has changed dramatically. Humanity has about 500 million people, most living where mountains used to be.

name: RYBot

name: Eggconsole Hydlide PC-8801
description:
Operate the hero Jim and defeat the demon Varalys, the strongest in mythology! A classic action RPG representing the 1980s. An active role-playing game released by T&E SOFT in 1984.

The player takes on the role of Jim, a brave young man, and his objective is to restore peace to Fairyland by searching for the lost gem and defeating the demon Varalys. Action is the key to this game. Players switch between attack and defense modes as they fight monsters by slamming Jim into them.

This game is a pioneer of the Japanese PC fantasy RPGs of the 1980's. It is a monster title that reigned at the top of the popularity rankings in PC game magazines for a long time, with its diverse and beautifully composed fields, including plains, castles, churches, and labyrinths.

name: Eggconsole Xanadu PC-8801mkIISR
description:
A monster title that recorded sales of 400,000 copies in the Japanese PC game market. When talking about the history of RPGs, you can’t leave this one out - it’s a must-play!

A side-view action RPG released by Nihon Falcom in 1985, the player takes on the role of an adventurer to explore a total of 10 stages and ultimately defeat the King Dragon. Stores are placed on the map and monsters roam the streets, but monsters are finite and cease to appear once they are hunted down.

Combat uses a symbol-encounting system. When you come in contact with an enemy, the battle scene switches to the battlefield, where you fight using weapon attacks (body blows) and magic. Treasure chests appear when enemies are defeated, and items and money can be acquired.

In this game, the player character does not have a profession, but has two types of experience and levels: warrior and wizard, and can grow into either a warrior or wizard type depending on which type of character is used to defeat enemies. Weapons, armor, and magic also have experience values, and using the same items can result in increased effectiveness.

With domestic sales of 400,000 units (Japan), this PC game from the 1980s still holds a record that remains unbroken. It's difficult to find another title that truly embodies the term 'epoch-making' as well as this one!

name: Dead Ninja Mortal Shadow
description:
"Hell comes with the power of darkness"
The demonic shadow comes first to the human world for one purpose, to destroy. With dark power, punish your opponents. Be fast, stealthy and deadly. Enter the world of the ninja and be the death.

name: Fatal Midnight
description:
At night, when the earth had already settled into darkness, Dan woke up from unusual sounds coming from the depths of the house. Concerned about his sister, he decides to check on her. Entering her room, he discovers that she has disappeared. Fear confronts him, and he begins to rush around the house in search of her.

Can you find your sister and help her?

name: Life & Crimes
description:
In 1979, robbers ransacked a bank vault in Kensington, London. The heist was unusually clean - no one was traced and in total 13.8 million pounds of gold and jewels have never been recovered. It now comes to you, our virtuos detective, to analyse and identify the culprits and unearth the shadowy conspiracy at its heart.

In this game you are tasked with matching criminals to their names and aliases. You can do this by searching a database, reading articles and listening to tapes.

name: The Russian Doll
description: The Russian Doll is the sibling game of The Remains of Richard Fletcher.

name: Copy! Right?
description:
A brand new mini detective game about song-writing.

Folk-Pop Singer-Songwriter Dan Shea is being sued by three artists for stealing their work. See if you can stop the steal.

name: SOVL: Fantasy Warfare
description: SOVL is a ruleset for playing fantasy wargames. It can be played with miniatures on a table or digitally on Steam.

name: Catgirl Chainsaw Massacre
description:
A cute story about a girl and her sister living in a small village.
What mischief will they get up to next? Find out!!

name: Little Goody Two Shoes: Deluxe Edition
description:
Take Little Goody Two Shoes’ music anywhere you go with the Deluxe Edition!

This bundle contains:
- Little Goody Two Shoes - a fairy tale horror adventure game with a dark twist. Follow Elise, an ambitious girl determined to become rich and escape her humble life in the village of Kieferberg.
- Official Soundtrack - The official soundtrack for Little Goody Two Shoes features 64 all-original tracks from the main game, including 3 unreleased bonus tracks.

name: Rakuen Hakai
description:
The Kaneiki brothers, a pair of brothers with supernatural abilities, used their powers to steal treasure after treasure until they were captured at last. Their sentence was to be exiled to a place that only espers could enter, commonly known as Paradise.
Will the brothers really be able to return home?
And what is the truth about Paradise?

name: Error422
description: Error 422 is modified version of Minecraft

name: Rainbow Fish and the Amazing Lagoon
description:
Rainbow Fish and the Amazing Lagoon is an interactive story based on characters created by the children's book author and illustrator, Marcus Pfister, for his picture book about the colorful fish, and on the television series stemming from the book.
An interactive underwater adventure where you can talk and play games with sea creatures.

name: Red Metal
description: Drive to survive in Red Metal, a vehicle-combat action roguelite packed with knuckle-clenching moments and wide variety of unlockable customizations. Mow down hordes of enemies. Perform insane stunts. Dodge nuclear strikes. Just another day in the Resistance. Fuel up. Fight back.

name: Parodius
description: A remake of the original MSX game that was included in the PSP compilation Parodius Portable. It recreates the MSX game but with added enhancements such as smooth scrolling as well as many configurable game options including a widescreen mode to fit the PSP screen.

name: Pokémon Reminiscencia
description: Pokémon Reminiscence is a Pokémon fangame created by Elena Vidad and Max. All Pokémon available up to 9th generation and Roguelike and Roguelite mechanics that increase replayability!

name: Broken Ecchi Gallery
description: Someone broke into our gallery and destroyed all the paintings and now you need to restore them. Broken Ecchi Gallery - a puzzle game in which you need to restore paintings of beautiful girls from the fragments.

name: Sonic Forces Overclocked
description: Sonic Forces Overclocked is a mod for Sonic Forces whose aim is to introduce fully new thought-out levels, with brand-new level design, visuals, and an original soundtrack.

name: Pedal Rebel VR
description: Pedal Rebel VR is a adrenaline-pumping cyberpunk motorbike street racing game that completely transforms any exercise bike and any VR headset into an immersive racing experience!

name: 20 Words // 20 Seconds
description: You have 20 seconds. For each prompt, type an English word that meets the criteria above. Words that you have used for an earlier criteria cannot be used again later.

name: Kukuevo
description: Kukuevo is a unique experience for those who are interested in mysterious stories and love visual novels. Get ready for an exciting adventure in a world of riddles and mysteries, in which your every move can determine the outcome of the game.

name: Hell Inspector's Mod of Stupidity
description: Hell Inspector's Mod of Stupidity is a mod for The Simpsons: Hit & Run that brings in numerous media properties for one very odd crossover featuring twelve new missions, four fully animated cutscenes, six unlockable cars, three unlockable costumes, and a dozen-odd character interactions.

name: Suikarad Gold
description: Suika clone

name: Happy Night
description:
Happy Night is a single player experience set in the Postal 2 Universe featuring a unique dismemberment system and wonderful Christmas story. The story takes place at a early date (31 December 1994) & location before the events of Postal 2. Dude need find way to celebrate this Christmas and do not lost place to stay.
Will Dude survive the night? Will he be able to save all that is expensive for him?

name: Spyro the Dragon
description: The Japanese version of Spyro changed many gameplay-related features, most notably the camera and Spyro's speed. It also adds PocketStation compatibility.

name: Five Nights at Wario's 4
description:
Five Nights at Wario's 4 is the 5th game in the series. The gameplay is in a style never seen before in a FNAF fan game :) I know I said I wouldn't make more FNAW games, but minds can change, and mine did. Fan games aren't hurting anybody, right? They're something I have fun making, and I choose to share them with you to play for free if you feel like it. So I don't feel this should be a bad thing for anybody.
The game takes places entierly on a TV screen... but is it real? Or are they just a dream? This is most likely them most challenging FNAW game out of them all. Can you beat all nights, and unlock the secret, new gamemode?

name: Undertale: True Genocide
description: Undertale: True Genocide is an Undertale fan-made game that takes place at the end of your genocide route in the original Undertale. True Genocide is a more story-driven fangame than your typical "press fight button to win" with you having to strategically ACT your way out of battles.

name: Little Bear Rainy Day Activities
description: Little Bear Rainy Day Activities is a CD-ROM game published by Creative Wonders and The Learning Company in 1999, based on the Little Bear books and television series. Little Bear finds lots of fun indoor activities to play on a rainy day. The activities in the game are all intended for ages 3 and up.

name: Freddy
description: Sin descripción

name: Gravico
description:
In this falling block puzzle game, position your pieces wisely to make clusters of 4+ blocks of the same color. The bigger the cluster, the more points you'll get. Most importantly, if you manage to chain cluster destructions with the fall of the blocks, you'll multiply your points.

Three different modes are available (after being unlocked), each one having a different rhythm.

name: Rosas are Red
description: Meet Rosa, a kind-hearted girl who wants to open up to you in more than one way! Take her on dates, choose your activities and fap your way into her heart.♡ Develop your relationship through your choices. Friend, Lover, Master. Which one are you?

name: Sandtrix+
description: Sandtrix+ is an expanded version of the freeware game Sandtrix. It extends the base game with new game modes, challenging color modes, and unlockable themes.

name: The Dragon, Thyme
description:
The Dragon, Thyme is a 3D Action Platformer with RPG elements. As a fox-eared adventurer named Paprika, you'll run, jump, and swing through beautiful and treacherous lands along with your dragon companion, Thyme. Defeat the forces of Chaos and collect mystical Hourglasses to bring Order back to the world.

Platforming - Use platforming abilities inspired by classic 3D platformers including, wall running, double jumping, and swinging from your Grapple Sword!

Thyme the Dragon - Fight alongside your constant companion, Thyme the Dragon! Collect shards of the elements themselves from your fallen foes to empower Thyme, allowing them to fight using the powers of fire, water, air, and many more!

Explore - Damaged by the tides of Chaos, the lands surrounding Aromata have become perilous. You and Thyme will need every resource at your disposal to survive! Hidden within the fractured lands and toxic swamps are the relics of Aromata's citizens. By recovering these Trinkets and summoning them back, you'll be able to use their services to upgrade your gear!

The Dragon Thyme is a student project developed by the team at Panda Castle. The game features 9 unique levels to explore and 6 elements, each with type advantages against one another and abilities for Paprika to harness.

name: N Step Steve: Part 2
description: The massive conclusion to the N Step Steve saga.
